nodes.text: Pigs were non-sentient species that could be found on the planet of Lothal in the Outer Rim Territories. They were known for rolling in the mud. One type of pig was the puffer pig. Members of the Ugnaught species were described as being "swine-snouted." Chadra-Fan, rodent-like sentients with large ears and a height of one meter, also had a pig-like snout.
Rebel pilot Jek Tono Porkins was nicknamed "Piggy".
